__e: You know he asked about you all the time?
She was asking about all the events, but I think there was only one she really cared about:
and he wondered about all the things here at home that might have changed. too. while he'd been away.
And I wondered why a woman like her, married, might have a crazy bond with her lover. Is she a prostitute?
I used to wonder why you did what you did, what made you leave.
And you wonder why I never wanted anything to do with the business. Okay.
And I wondered why a woman like her, married, might have a crazy bond with her lover. Is she a prostitute?
And you wonder why I never wanted anything to do with the business. Okay.
I used to wonder why you did what you did, what made you leave.
I loved them so much and I was doing everything wrong. And you were away so often, calling me, and asking me how my day went... And I couldn't even say it to you because I felt so ashamed...
Next morning-- or that night when I came home, if he was still up-- he would ask me, "How was the mouse tonight?"
And whenever I would ask him how he did it or how he knew, he would just say that he could sense, you know, what was about to happen.
I wondered when you'd join the party.
After four days we wondered, "When will he leave?"
I've always wondered... when I'd move around in a bus?
When my dad asked me what I planned to do with myself, I actually had something to say.
I never thought that she had done something wrong... so oftentimes I wondered what I had done wrong.
He would ask me what I wanted about everything... lunch, what movie I wanted to see.
When my dad asked me what I planned to do with myself, I actually had something to say.
He would ask me what I wanted about everything... lunch, what movie I wanted to see.
I never thought that she had done something wrong... so oftentimes I wondered what I had done wrong.
I was wondering if you would want to have dinner with me sometime.
I haven't heard from her for a few days and I wondered if you had heard anything.
And I was wondering if you had said anything that might have upset her?
And, well, I was just wondering if maybe she said anything or, you know, if she was scared?
Five years and every week, I would ask him if I could see my baby and he kept saying next week.
Before you got married, didn't you wonder if this was the person you were meant to spend the rest of your life with?
